MUST SEE QUICKLY! üëè NO FEE Upper East Side Oasis! Top floor beautifully renovated 1 bedroom looking out onto John Jay Park offers strip wood floors - recessed lighting along with customized closet. Separate windowed eat-in kitchen includes white wood shaker style cabinets , quartz counters and stainless steel appliances. Pristine windowed bathroom with marble floor and classic white subway tiled walls. Access to Q/4/5/6 Trains. ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED
